dublicated abs widget: This exact widget is already present on the page.
backups add first: Make the first manual backup copy
backup title error: The length of a backup name must be within 3-32 characters.
backup limit error: Error. The maximum number of backups is %1.
backup title length error: The backup name is too short.
backup restore confirm text: Are you sure you want to restore the website backup?
backup remove confirm text: Are you sure you want to delete the backup?
backup limit exceed: The limit on manual backups has been exceeded.
backup on create new removed oldest: When creating a new backup, the backup dated %1 will be deleted.
backup restored: Website restored successfully from the backup
adblock detected: You are probably using programs that block ads on websites and they may affect the way our builder works. We don't show any ads in the builder, so we recommend disabling your ad blocker or whitelisting %1.
error during site publish: An error occurred when publishing the website
changes in post fall directly on the sit: Post changes will be published to the website automatically
you can not plan the last publication: You cannot schedule the post in the past
publication not available: To publish your site, you need to buy a plan
publish site and talk about: Publish your website, let other people know about it!
publish again tooltip: Made changes to your website? Publish it now, so your visitors can see them.
press left button and move widget to pag: Drag the widget onto the site, holding the left mouse button
there is no blocks in this category: There are no blocks in this category
borders detached: Not attached to the edges of the screen
borders attached: Attached to the edges of the screen

block-empty.title: Container block
block-empty.description:
The content doesn't stretch to fit the width of a screen.

This block type is recommended for Text, Card, Heading, and other text widgets.

block-empty-fluid.title: Fluid block
block-empty-fluid.description:
The block adjusts to the width of a screen.

Use this block type if you want Slider or Gallery to fit the screen. For text widgets use blocks with a container.

Drag elements or block from the left pan: Drag Widgets or Blocks from the left panel onto the page.
Drag elements from the left panel: Drag widgets from the left panel onto the page.
orderForm order saved successfully: Order of pop-up windows has been successfully saved
page __404 desc: The 404 error occurs when the page does not exist, or the address has been entered incorrectly
page __privacy_policy desc: The Privacy Policy page of your website. Add a link to it in the Menu
page __user_agreement desc: The User Agreement page of your website. Add a link to it in the Menu
page not found and is probaly removed: The page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have deleted it.
not valid text, please not use html: Invalid data. Please don't use HTML.
link is probably external: The menu item probably links to an external page
do you really want to remove the page: Are you sure you want to delete the page?
shown in browser header: This will be displayed in the title bar of the browser.
shown in browser header example: It is displayed in the address bar of the browser. For example, "page".
description help: The Description meta tag. Is used to describe the page in the search engines

seo settings.friendly URL description: Displayed in the address bar of the browser
seo settings.tag title help: Title expressing the page's main idea
seo settings.meta description help: Describe what this page is about in a couple of sentences
seo settings.tag image help: Choose an image that'll be set as the page's preview image for sharing in messengers and social media
seo settings.tag image help other and common: To change the image for this page, disable the "Set the selected image as default for all site pages" option in the Home page settings
seo settings.tag image switcher label: Set the selected image as default for all site pages
seo settings.tag image switcher hint: When this option is enabled, the chosen image will be applied as a preview thumbnail to all site pages, except News pages on the blog
seo settings.tag image hint index: The image will show as a preview thumbnail when the link to this page is shared on social media
seo settings.tag image hint others: The image will show as a preview thumbnail when the link to this page is shared on social media. But if the "Set the selected image as default for all site pages" option is activated in the Home page settings, you won't be able to set another image for this page

disallow robots txt: An individual robots.txt file has been activated for your website. You can disable search engine indexing of a page on your own by going to Settings > Robots.txt
meta keywords help: The Keywords meta tag.  Contains a list of keywords for search engines
apply the background for current page: Apply the background only to the current page

widgets to appear on the site
parallax notes: Creates a perception of depth by animating the background
fill width: Fit the image to screen width
customize element in left panel:
Customize the widget
on the left panel
info header not add elements: Drag lower, widgets cannot be added to the header.
info footer not add elements: Drag higher, widgets cannot be added to the footer.
there are not albums with images: There are no albums with images
there are not images in this album: There are no images in this album
add your images from social apps: Add your pictures from social networks
there are not images, load images: You haven't uploaded any images. Why not add some?
there are not images, try other category: There are no images in this category. Please try another one
add children to show this item: Add nested items if you want this item to appear in the menu
throw for start upload: Release the button to start the uploading

help.title: Statistics
help.intro: Here you can connect statistics on goals.
help.what are goals: A goal is a specific action completed by a visitor on your website: clicking on a button, sending a message via a contact form, requesting a callback, and other activities that contribute to the success of your business. The goal statistics is available on Google Analytics.
help.yandex and goals: On Yandex.Metrics a goal is added automatically. After a while you will be able to view the statistics for the added goal.
help.google and goals: On Google Analytics a goal has to be created manually. Learn how to do it here.

errors.error while checking: Error while checking the existence of the goal

greeting.heading: Welcome to uKit!
greeting.description_0_1: We'll introduce you to the uKit interface and its features and show you how you can quickly and easily create your own site. Ready?

widgets.heading: Use Widgets to Build Your Site
widgets.description_1_1: Drag them from the left panel and drop them on the page. All widgets are divided into categories.

blocks.heading: Use Blocks to Build Your Site
blocks.description_2_1: You can drag and drop an entire block that already has several widgets in it. This is much faster.
blocks.description_2_2: A few clicks and it's done!

constructor canvas.heading: Full Control Over the Page
constructor canvas.description_3_1: You can drag, remove, and resize any widget. Blocks can also be rearranged, saved, and reused on your site in the future.

button.heading: Widget Settings
button.description_4_1: To edit the widget, just click on it! Some of the settings will appear above the widget, the others — on the left panel.

leftPanel.heading: Left Panel
leftPanel.description_5_1: On the left panel, you can add pages, manage the design, and activate the mobile version of the site. All you need is at your hand.

help.heading: We Are Here to Help You
help.description_6_1: You can get back to the Help Center at any time: to retake the product tour or browse our Knowledge Base

done.heading: Publish Your Site. Let the World Know
done.description_7_1: Don't forget to publish your site when you finish it. Once published, it will be available to visitors.

trial.heading: Your trial has expired
trial.desc: You need to upgrade to keep your site live. Choose one of the available subscriptions.
trial.desc premium: You need to renew your plan to keep the site live. Choose one of the available subscriptions.

services.uKit capabilities: All features of the uKit builder
services.storage: Unlimited bandwidth and storage for your files
services.domain: Option to connect a domain to your site
services.online chat: Ready-to-use integrations with a live chat for your site, callback widget, and analytics systems
services.other: And many more! See the full list of features on the pricing page
